product.name: Remote Solar Survey
product.description: Uses AI-based technology, LiDAR, photogrammetry, and satellite imagery to assess the solar potential of buildings, portfolios, or cities, providing detailed reports on installation costs, savings, and payback periods.

product.name: Solar Panel Installation
product.description: Manages the design, funding, and installation of solar panels, including ongoing maintenance and monitoring to ensure optimal performance and savings.

product.name: Solar Audits
product.description: Conducts detailed assessments of selected properties to deliver full business cases and optimal designs for solar installations.

product.name: Switched-on-Solar
product.description: An online app that allows residents to assess the solar potential of their properties by entering their postcode, providing details on cost savings, electricity production, and CO2 savings.
